item.title: Spring Harvard Courses with Largest Jumps in Undergrad Enrollment, 2016-2019
item.description: Enrollment in Harvard courses fluctuates year to year, but a few classes catch fire from time to time. Whether by way of timely material or a star teaching team, the size of some classes can swell exponentially.
